c74object.name: tap.pan~
c74object.description: The tap.pan~ object pans an input source between two output sources.

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: Determines the shape of the of the crossfade function.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Determines the algorithm to use. In most cases it is best to use the 512-point lookup table.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: 0. to 1. pans between output1 and output2. This attribute is overridden by a signal connected to the right inlet, if it is present.
